features.featureTitle: Update the selected “More Details” button in the Pre‑Meditation page’s Meditation Guide container (selected element XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[3]/div[1]/button[1]) so it renders at the bottom of the guide container instead of in the guide header area, without changing its label or navigation behavior (it must still navigate to /knowledge with the current meditation type and scrollToContent search param).

Update the selected “Begin Meditation” button (selected element XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/button[1]) so that on lower-width screens—when the action buttons area collapses from a 2-column/side-by-side layout into a single-column stack—its visual height increases to better match the “Save as Ritual” button. This change must only affect the small-screen stacked layout and must not change the button’s width or behavior.
